mapper.select: select count(*)totalNum , (select count(*) from tb_user where SUBSTRING(create_time,1,10)=SUBSTRING(now(),1,10))todayNum from tb_user

SELECT count(*) orderNum,SUM(t.txnum) BuyNum , (select count(*) from tb_trade_detail where `status`='1' and SUBSTRING(create_time,1,10)=SUBSTRING(now(),1,10)) todayOrderNum, (select SUM(txnum) from tb_trade_detail where `status`='1' and SUBSTRING(create_time,1,10)=SUBSTRING(now(),1,10)) todayBuyNum FROM tb_trade_detail t where t.`status`='1'

SELECT sum(t.outamnt) outAmnt, (select sum(outamnt) from tb_acc_outdetail where SUBSTRING(create_time,1,10)=SUBSTRING(now(),1,10)) todayOutAmnt, (select sum(froze_amnt) from tb_acc)frozeAmnt FROM tb_acc_outdetail t
